General.Name: Atul Auto Limited
General.Description: Atul Auto Limited manufactures and sells three wheeler automobiles in India. The company offers passenger and cargo, e-rickshaw, and delivery vans, as well as parts and accessories. Its products are diesel, petrol, CNG, LPG, and electric fueled vehicles. The company offers its products under the Atul RIK, Atul Elite, Atul Gem, Atul Gemini, Atul Smart, and Atul Shakti brand names. It also exports its products to Bangladesh, Nepal, Cambodia, Myanmar, South Africa, the United Kingdom, Ethiopia, Liberia, Sierra Leone, Tanzania, Ecuador, Bolivia, Guatemala, Honduras, and Mexico. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Rajkot, India.
